TradeLayer Dev (DEX, Wallets, Orderbook).summary: Core focus on DEX infrastructure, wallets, and orderbook debugging. Peaked Mar–May, then declined as fixes stabilized and attention shifted.

Algo Trading / Market Making.summary: Climbed steadily to a July peak, centered on scalping strategies, MM incentives, and algo trading UI. Slight decline in Aug as engineering took focus.

AI Research (QFT, Alignment, Storyworlds.summary: Highly volatile and visionary. Peaked in Jun with CODAC/QFT, FRC, and storyworlds. Sustained intensity through Aug.

Metaphysics / Theology (Islam, Eschatolo.summary: Steady but lower intensity. Peaks in May–Jul with Qur’anic and eschatological exploration tied to AI alignment thought.

Fundraising / Strategy (VC, CORFO, Marke.summary: Active Mar–Apr (CORFO, investors), dipped in Jun, renewed in Jul with Expo/Match-Trade focus. Stable but secondary in Aug.

Writing / Creative (Blighted Galaxy, Ess.summary: Gradual climb to Jul peak, blending fiction and metaphysical essays. Cooled slightly in Aug but remains integrative outlet.
